title: Xception Classifier w/ FFHQ - Training - LB: .555
description: Simple baseline binary classifier using FFHQ dataset to balance the dataThis kernal shows a simple training pipeline. I'm sure a lot can be improved upon. View this kernal for inference and submission: https://www.kaggle.com/greatgamedota/xception-binary-classifier-inference Thanks to: @unkownhihi for dataset and corresponding kernal: https://www.kaggle.com/unkownhihi/starter-kernel-with-cnn-model-ll-lb-0-69235 @humananalog for inference kernal: https://www.kaggle.com/humananalog/inference-demo Link to my FFHQ dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/greatgamedota/ffhq-face-data-set Update 1: Fixed data leak when balancing data and added more augmentations
